column7: stopping prosecutions of low level, non-violent drug offenses?
column8: should homan square detention center be shut down?
column9: appointing an independent prosecutor to investigate all local police-involved shootings?
column10: bringing criminal charges against police officers who falsify or file misleading official reports?
column11: supporting an elected civilian police accountability council for purposes of investigating police misconduct in relation to officers keeping their jobs?
column12: should murder charges have been brought faster than 400 days against the police officer who shot laquan mcdonald?
